MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL61 postcode area of LlanfairPG, affecting properties in Ffordd Angharad and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:38AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9:15AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:22AM on 12th November 2020
